crazyballrun.game.music

Class MusicEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.music.MusicEngine

  • public class MusicEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    MusicEngine handles all stuff for playering background music and forcing sound effects (e.g. due to a button click).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void end()
      Ends all threads the MusicEngine controls.
      static MusicEngine getInstance()
      Provides access to the music engine.
      java.lang.String getMusic(java.lang.String filename)
      Gets the absolute path of a music file from the resource-folder for the sounds.
      boolean getMusicState()
      Returns the state of music (on or off).
      boolean getSoundState()
      Gets the current state of the sound (on or off).
      void initialize()
      Initializes the MusicEngine, e.g. by loading music files from the resource- folder.
      void playMusic(java.lang.String name)
      Plays a song once.

      Plays a list of songs, optionally in a loop.

      Plays a song, optionally looped.

      Plays one or several songs, optionally looped.

      Plays a sound effect.

      Turns music on or off.
      void setSoundState(boolean state)
      Turns sound on or off.
      void start()
      Starts the music engine by running the music thread.
      void stopMusic()
      Stops playing the current song.

        Provides access to the music engine.

        Initializes the MusicEngine, e.g. by loading music files from the resource- folder.

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the music engine by running the music thread.

      • end

        public void end()
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Ends all threads the MusicEngine controls.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - problems with interruptions might occur

        Turns music on or off.
        Parameters:

        Returns the state of music (on or off).

      • playMusicFile

        public void playMusicFile(java.lang.String name,
                 boolean loop,
                 boolean wait)
        Plays a song, optionally looped.
        Parameters:
        name - absolute path + filename of the music file
        loop - play the song in a loop
        wait - wait for the current song before starting the song

      • playMusicFile

        public void playMusicFile(java.lang.String[] names,
                 boolean loop,
                 boolean wait)
        Plays one or several songs, optionally looped.
        Parameters:
        names - absolute path + filename of the music files
        loop - play the song in a loop
        wait - wait for the current song before starting the song

      • playMusic

        public void playMusic(java.lang.String name)
        Plays a song once.
        Parameters:
        name - string identifier of the music file

      • playMusic

        public void playMusic(java.lang.String name,
             boolean loop,
             boolean wait)
        Plays a song, optionally looped.
        Parameters:
        name - string identifier of the music file
        loop - play the song in a loop
        wait - wait for the current song before starting the song

      • playMusic

        public void playMusic(java.lang.String[] names,
             boolean loop,
             boolean wait)
        Plays a list of songs, optionally in a loop.
        Parameters:
        names - song filenames
        loop - play songs in a loop
        wait - wait for the current song before starting the new playlist

      • stopMusic

        public void stopMusic()
        Stops playing the current song.
